applicant-name.name: UNIV OF CHINESE ACADEMY OF SCIENCES
BINZHOU WEIQIAO GUOKE ADVANCED TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE
滨州魏桥国科高等技术研究院

invention-title: Cerium-vanadium double-doped tungsten oxide/nickel-tungsten alloy composite self-supporting electrode material and preparation method and application thereof
一种铈钒双掺杂的氧化钨/镍钨合金复合自支撑电极材料及其制备方法与应用

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of electrolyzed water catalysts, in particular to a cerium-vanadium double-doped tungsten oxide/nickel-tungsten alloy composite self-supporting electrode material and a preparation method and application of the cerium-vanadium double-doped tungsten oxide/nickel-tungsten alloy composite self-supporting electrode material. The preparation method comprises the following steps: (1) taking foamed nickel as a substrate, dispersing nickel salt, vanadium salt, tungsten salt and a surfactant in a solvent for hydrothermal reaction to obtain foamed nickel with a vanadium-doped nickel-tungsten hydroxide precursor grown on the surface; (2) carrying out hydrothermal reaction on the foamed nickel sample obtained in the step (1) and a mixed solution composed of cerium salt, urea and ammonium fluoride to obtain foamed nickel with a cerium-vanadium double-doped nickel-tungsten hydroxide precursor grown on the surface; and (3) placing the foamed nickel sample obtained in the step (2) in a tubular furnace, introducing gas, heating, preserving heat, and cooling to obtain the cerium-vanadium double-doped tungsten oxide/nickel-tungsten alloy composite self-supporting electrode material. The cerium-vanadium double-doped tungsten oxide/nickel tungsten alloy composite self-supporting electrode material has excellent wide-range water electrolysis hydrogen evolution activity and urea oxidation reaction catalysis performance in a urea-containing alkaline electrolyte, is a bifunctional electrocatalyst with excellent performance, and can be widely applied to water electrolysis hydrogen production; especially for urea-assisted water electrolysis hydrogen production, efficient and energy-saving water electrolysis hydrogen production can be achieved, excessive urea resources in the environment can be effectively utilized, and the method has good commercial application prospects and is suitable for popularization and commercial production.

本发明涉及电解水催化剂技术领域，具体涉及一种铈钒双掺杂的氧化钨/镍钨合金复合自支撑电极材料及其制备方法与应用。制备方法包括（1）以泡沫镍为基底，将镍盐、钒盐、钨盐、表面活性剂分散在溶剂中进行水热反应，得到表面生长有钒掺杂的镍钨氢氧化物前驱体的泡沫镍；（2）将步骤（1）得到的泡沫镍样品与铈盐、尿素、氟化铵组成的混合溶液进行水热反应，得到表面生长有铈钒双掺杂的镍钨氢氧化物前驱体的泡沫镍；（3）将步骤（2）得到的泡沫镍样品放置在管式炉中，通入气体，升温、保温后降温，即可得到铈钒双掺杂的氧化钨/镍钨合金复合自支撑电极材料。本发明铈钒双掺杂的氧化钨/镍钨合金复合自支撑电极材料具有优异的宽范围的电解水析氢活性和含有尿素的碱性电解液中的催化尿素氧化反应性能，是一种性能优异的双功能电催化剂，可广泛用于电解水制氢，特别是尿素辅助的电解水制氢，能够实现高效节能电解水制氢和有效利用环境中过剩的尿素资源，具有良好的商业应用前景，适于推广与商业化生产。
